short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rignite is a social media management software solution that helps your business get results from social marketing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rignite is a social media management software solution that helps your business get results from social marketing. Grow your following, boost engagement, and win sales. Easily. With less hassle. Try it now for free at http://www.rignite.com/sign-up

The Rignite Social Post Extension for Chrome enables Rignite users to post a link through their Rignite account for a web page they are visiting. You must be logged in to your Rignite account to post through this extension.
